channel.title: [Standard] WoW:BfA v1.1 - Starting
channel.description:
**Welcome to World of Warcraft: Battle for Azeroth v2!**
Hosted by @KyoDaz
This setup follows simple forum rules
1. https://toli.es/rules 2. https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926/
The setup will start once 16 players have signed up. Backups, spectators and co-hosts are appreciated.
**Gameplay**
Days will be 48 hours long, or shorter if someone is jettisoned. Nights will be 24 hours long or until everyone has submitted their actions. Actions are done by messaging me. Players receive both a class and race. The race determines your alignment. You may choose one specialization once you receive your class. This cannot be changed. The informed minority are aware of the faction superpowerâ€™s classcard and identity. The informed minority have a 24/7 day and night chat. The informed minority win once they outnumber the uninformed majority. The informed minority do not have a faction kill. If the faction superpower dies the outnumbered faction will be able to kill every odd night. Your class, specialization and race will be revealed upon flip. Positive effects are anything that are mostly beneficial to a player such as visit prevention or healing. Negative effects are anything that are mostly harmful to a player such as occupation or redirection. Delayed abilities are ninja. There will be a period of silence once all of the classcards have been dealt. This is to enable players to select pre-game things such as specializations.
**Executions**
To jettison someone say "**/jettison [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" There will be a day one jettison. Executions end the day. Executions will be majority + plurality.
**After The Night**
Only investigative abilities will return feedback. It will either be a result or 'You could not investigate your target.'
**To Join**
To join, please '**/in**'
Alternate accounts will be allowed in WoW:BfA v2. You must however inform me of your identity beforehand and also submit an application directly to @Arete
Identity of alternate accounts will never be revealed to anyone unless moderator intervention is required and a behavioural rule is broken or a major game rule is broken such as intentional integrity breaches. This will always be done after the game except in extreme circumstances.
If you are unsure about my custom policy message me. Otherwise questions about the program as a whole should go in private messages with a moderator or preferably [here](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/new-alternate-account-applications/82086).
**Role List**
[details="Role List #1"] Role List #1 Horde Horde Horde Horde Horde Horde Horde Horde Horde Horde Horde Horde Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Superpower [/details]
[details="Role List #2"] Role List #1 Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Alliance Horde Horde Horde Horde Superpower [/details] **Role Cards**
[color=#144587]Alliance[/color] Race Cards
[details="Alliance Races"] > # [color=#ffd700]Human[/color] > > > > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color]** > **Resolve (Passive)** - If a member of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] is jettisoned then your abilities tonight do not consume a charge. This does not affect abilities with no charges. This does not affect Holy Word: Serenity. > **Diplomacy (Day)** - Select a player and [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] race. You will be informed if they are that race at the start of the night. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Dwarf[/color] > > > > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color]** > **Explorer (Passive)** - You are informed upon occupation and redirection. > **Stoneform (Day)** - You will be death immune tonight. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Night Elf[/color] > > > > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color]** > **Elune's Grace (Passive)** - Upon dying, you may use one of your night abilities the following night whilst dead. > **Shadowmeld (Day)** - You are immune to any effects that are triggered upon visiting tonight. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Gnome[/color] > > > > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color]** > **Expansive Mind (Passive)** - You may use your night ability twice. Does not affect night abilities that kill. > **Nimble Fingers (Day)** - Sabotage a player causing their day ability to be ineffective. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Draenei[/color] > > > > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color]** > **Heroic Presence (Passive)** - Any member of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] attempting to visit you will be guaranteed to succeed. > **Gift of the Naaru (Day)** - Heal the targeted player tonight. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Worgen[/color] > > > > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color]** > **Two Forms (Passive)** - You are assigned a random [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] race to mimic. The abilities you can use will alternate between days. You will start as a Worgen. You will flip as whatever race you are currently on. You cannot be a race that cannot be your class. > **Flay (Day)** - Maul a player. They will die in two days unless healed. They will be aware. You will suicide if you kill a member of your faction. - 1 use > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.* [/details]
[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] Race Cards
[details="Horde Races"] > # [color=#ffd700]Orc[/color] > > > > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]** > **Hardiness (Passive)** - Positive effects used on you last for twice as long. This does not affect Holy Word: Serenity > **Blood Fury (Day)** - Slash at a player. They will die in two days unless healed. They will be aware. This can only be used on odd days. You will suicide if you kill a member of your faction. - 1 use > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Undead[/color] > > > > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]** > **Undead (Passive)** - You may talk to the living for two days after death. > **Touch of the Grave (Day)** - Establish a link between you and a dead player, allowing you to communicate for the night. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Tauren[/color] > > > > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]** > **Endurance (Passive)** - You are immune to the first attack made on you. > **War Stomp (Day)** - Occupy a target player tonight. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Troll[/color] > > > > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]** > **Regeneration (Passive)** - Every even night you will self heal. > **Berserk (Day)** - Occupy all players targeting you tonight. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Blood Elf[/color] > > > > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]** > **Arcane Affinity (Passive)** - Your abilities will always bypass positive effects on the target. > **Arcane Torrent (Day)** - Prevent any positive effects from affecting the target player. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#ffd700]Goblin[/color] > > > > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]** > **Time is Money (Passive)** - Any of your abilities that are unsuccessful will instead be delayed by one day/night. > **Rocket Jump (Day)** - Avoid all day abilities that would have affected you today. - 2 uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.* [/details]
Class Cards
[details="Classes"] > # [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color] > > > > **[color=grey]Arms[/color]**, **[color=orange]Fury[/color]** or **[color=steblue]Protection[/color]** > > > [color=grey]Arms[/color] > **Intimidating Shout (Night)** - Discover a player's class. - Infinite uses > **Tactician (Night)** - Redirect a player to another player. - 2 uses > > [color=orange]Fury[/color] > **Intimidating Shout (Night)** - Discover a player's class. - Infinite uses > **Furious Slash (Night)** - Attack a target player. You will suicide if you kill a member of your faction. - 1 use > > [color=#stebluef]Protection[/color] > **Intimidating Shout (Night)** - Discover a player's class. - Infinite uses > **Revenge (Night)** - If the target player is attacking you tonight, become death immune and attack them. - 2 uses > >Races that can be [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color]: All Races
> # [color=#ABD473]Hunter[/color] > > > > **[color=#20b2aa]Beast Mastery[/color]**, **[color=#ff69b4]Marksmanship[/color]** or **[color=#9acd32]Survival[/color]** > > > [color=#20b2aa]Beast Mastery[/color] > **Tripwire (Night)** - Set a snare at a player's house. You will be told who visited them. - Infinite uses > **Befriend (Night)** - Tame a beast. You will gain a random ability from any class to use the next night. This cannot be an ability from a faction superpower. After that, the ability will revert back to Befriend. - 2 uses > > [color=#ff69b4]Marksmanship[/color] > **Tripwire (Night)** - Set a snare at a player's house. You will be told who visited them. - Infinite uses > **Mark (Night)** - Mark a player. You will be informed of who they visit. - 3 uses > > [color=#9acd32]Survival[/color] > **Tripwire (Night)** - Set a snare at a player's house. You will be told who visited them. - Infinite uses > **Camp (Night)** - Camp out beside another player's house. You will see all the effects that happened to them last night. This includes day abilities that affect the night. - 3 uses > >Races that can be [color=#ABD473]Hunter[/color]: All Races
> # [color=#FFF569]Rogue[/color] > > > > **[color=grey]Assassination[/color]**, **[color=black]Outlaw[/color]** or **[color=#e0ffff]Subtlety[/color]** > > > [color=grey]Assassination[/color] > **Stealth (Night)** - Sneak around a player's house, learning how many abilities they have used in total. - Infinite uses > **Mutilate (Night)** - Kill a player. Their flip will not be revealed. - 1 use > > [color=black]Outlaw[/color] > **Stealth (Night)** - Sneak around a player's house, learning how many abilities they have used in total. - Infinite uses > **Bribe (Night)** - Bribe a player, redirecting all players visiting you to them. - 3 uses > > [color=#e0ffff]Subtlety[/color] > **Stealth (Night)** - Sneak around a player's house, learning how many abilities they have used in total. - Infinite uses > **Blind (Night)** - Cause a player to visit themselves. - 2 uses > >Races that can be [color=#FFF569]Rogue[/color]: Dwarf, Gnome, Human, Night Elf, Worgen, Blood Elf, Goblin, Orc, Troll, Undead
> # [color=#FFFFFF]Priest[/color] > > > > **[color=#fafad2]Discipline[/color]**, **[color=#f8f8ff]Holy[/color]** or **[color=purple]Shadow[/color]** > > > [color=#fafad2]Discipline[/color] > **Shadow Mend (Night)** - Heal a player, treating any wounds and preventing their death. They will die in two nights unless prevented. This ability cannot prevent deaths caused by Shadow Mend. - Infinite uses > **Power Word: Shield (Night)** - Prevent a player from dying in the night. Lasts until changed. Disabled once two deaths are prevented by this ability. This can prevent deaths from Shadow Mend. - Infinite uses > > [color=#f8f8ff]Holy[/color] > **Heal (Night)** - Heal a player, treating any wounds and preventing their death. - Infinite uses > **Holy Word: Serenity (Night)** - Prevent a player from being jettisoned tomorrow. This will be announced at daystart. - 1 use > > [color=purple]Shadow[/color] > **Shadow Mend (Night)** - Heal a player, treating any wounds and preventing their death. They will die in two nights unless prevented. This ability cannot prevent deaths caused by Shadow Mend. - Infinite uses > **Shadow Word: Pain (Night)** - Cause a player's negative effects inflicted tonight to inflict the following night as well. - 3 uses > >Races that can be [color=#FFFFFF]Priest[/color]: Draenei, Dwarf, Gnome, Human, Night Elf, Worgen, Blood Elf, Goblin, Tauren, Troll, Undead
> # [color=#C41F3B]Death Knight[/color] > > > > **[color=#8c1616]Blood[/color]**, **[color=#6495ed]Frost[/color]** or **[color=#556b2f]Unholy[/color]** > > > [color=#8c1616]Blood[/color] > **Gorefiend's Grasp (Night)** - Redirect all players targeting your target to you. - Infinite uses > **Vampiric Blood (Night)** - Drain a player's blood, healing you. If you use this a second time on the same player they will die however you will not be healed. You will suicide if you kill a member of your faction. - 3 uses > > [color=#6495ed]Frost[/color] > **Gorefiend's Grasp (Night)** - Redirect all players targeting your target to you. - Infinite uses > **Rime (Night)** - Ensure that if a player is to die tonight then it cannot be protected. - 3 uses > > [color=#556b2f]Unholy[/color] > **Gorefiend's Grasp (Night)** - Redirect all players targeting your target to you. - Infinite uses > **Raise Dead (Night)** - Puppet a dead player, using a selected night ability on another player. This cannot be used on a Superpower. - 2 uses > >Races that can be [color=#C41F3B]Death Knight[/color]: All Races
> # [color=#40C7EB]Mage[/color] > > > > **[color=#9370db]Arcane[/color]**, **[color=#b22222]Fire[/color]** or **[color=#6495ed]Frost[/color]** > > > [color=#9370db]Arcane[/color] > **Blink (Night)** - Blink towards a target, preventing visits to yourself. You will die should they die. - Infinite uses > **Prismatic Barrier (Night)** - Prevent all abilities from being used on your target. Does not prevent attacks. - 3 uses > > [color=#b22222]Fire[/color] > **Blink (Night)** - Blink towards a target, preventing visits to yourself. You will die should they die. - Infinite uses > **Blazing Barrier (Night)** - Cast a blazing barrier on the target, publicly revealing all players who visited them during the day. - 2 uses > > [color=#6495ed]Frost[/color] > **Blink (Night)** - Blink towards a target, preventing visits to yourself. You will die should they die. - Infinite uses > **Ice Barrier (Night)** - Delay all visits to the target player by one night. - 3 uses > >Races that can be [color=#40C7EB]Mage[/color]: Draenei, Dwarf, Gnome, Human, Night Elf, Worgen, Blood Elf, Goblin, Orc, Troll, Undead
> # [color=#8787ED]Warlock[/color] > > > > **[color=#006400]Affliction[/color]**, **[color=#663399]Demonology[/color]** or **[color=#ff4500]Destruction[/color]** > > > [color=#006400]Affliction[/color] > **Create Soulwell (Night)** - Target a player. All players visiting that player will be healed except yourself. - Infinite uses > **Agony (Night)** - Slowly cause a player to decay, killing them if they are healed tonight. - 3 uses > > [color=#663399]Demonology[/color] > **Create Soulwell (Night)** - Target a player. All players visiting that player will be healed except yourself. - Infinite uses > **Demonic Gateway (Night)** - Select two targets, redirecting everyone visiting A to B and B to A. - 2 uses > > [color=#ff4500]Destruction[/color] > **Create Soulwell (Night)** - Target a player. All players visiting that player will be healed except yourself. - Infinite uses > **Incinerate (Night)** - Kill a player. Their flip will not be revealed. - 1 use > >Races that can be [color=#8787ED]Warlock[/color]: Dwarf, Gnome, Human, Worgen, Blood Elf, Goblin, Orc, Troll, Undead
> # [color=#8787ED]Druid[/color] > > > > **[color=#800080]Balance[/color]**, **[color=#00008b]Feral[/color]**, **[color=#c0c0c0]Guardian[/color]** or **[color=#32cd32]Restoration[/color]** > > > [color=#800080]Balance[/color] > **Shapeshift (Night)** - Change specialization. - Infinite uses > **Innervate (Night)** - Cause a player being healed or healing to guarantee their healing. - 2 uses > > [color=#00008b]Feral[/color] > **Shapeshift (Night)** - Change specialization. - Infinite uses > **Maul (Night)** - Maul a player, killing them. You will suicide if you kill a member of your faction. - 2 uses > > [color=#c0c0c0]Guardian[/color] > **Shapeshift (Night)** - Change specialization. - Infinite uses > **Iron Fur (Night)** Become death immune tonight. - 2 uses > > [color=#32cd32]Restoration[/color] > **Shapeshift (Night)** - Change specialization. - Infinite uses > **Heal (Night)** - Heal a player, treating any wounds and preventing their death. - 2 uses > >Races that can be [color=#8787ED]Druid[/color]: Night Elf, Worgen, Tauren, Troll
> # [color=#91FFA7]Monk[/color] > > > > **[color=#966A3E]Brewmaster[/color]**, **[color=#67FF5C]Mistweaver[/color]** or **[color=#6B61FF]Windwalker[/color]** > > > [color=#966A3E]Brewmaster[/color] > **Transcendence (Night)** - The target player will be able to send infinite anonymous messages to you tomorrow. - Infinite uses > **Stagger (Night)** - Should you die tonight, delay your death by one night. Your death the following night may only be saved by Blessed Gift of the Naaru. - 3 uses > > [color=#67FF5C]Mistweaver[/color] > **Transcendence (Night)** - The target player will be able to send infinite anonymous messages to you tomorrow. - Infinite uses > **Transcendence: Transfer (Night)** - Swap yourself and the last person you used Transcendence on. This ability cannot be prevented or occupied. - 4 uses > > [color=#6B61FF]Windwalker[/color] > **Transcendence (Night)** - The target player will be able to send infinite anonymous messages to you tomorrow. - Infinite uses > **Blackout Kick (Night)** - The next ability the target player uses will fail. This is not considered an effect, occupation or prevention. - 2 uses > >Races that can be [color=#91FFA7]Monk[/color]: Draenei, Dwarf, Gnome, Human, Night Elf, Blood Elf, Orc, Tauren, Troll, Undead [/details]
[color=#144587]Alliance[/color] [color=gold]Superpowers[/color]
[details="Superpower Races & Class"] > # [color=#144587]Jaina Proudmoore[/color] > > > > **Human [color=#40C7EB]Mage[/color]** > **For the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Human [color=#40C7EB]Mage[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#40C7EB]Mage[/color] and all the passives of a Human. > **Influential Diplomacy (Day)** - Learn if a player is a member of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]. - Infinite uses > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#144587]Magni Bronzebeard[/color] > > > > **Dwarf [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color]** > **For the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Dwarf [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color] and all the passives of a Dwarf. > **Regenerative Stoneform (Day)** - You will be death immune and heal yourself tonight. - Infinite uses > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#144587]Malfurion Stormrage[/color] > > > > **Night Elf [color=#8787ED]Druid[/color]** > **For the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Night Elf [color=#8787ED]Druid[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#8787ED]Druid[/color] and all the passives of a Night Elf. > **Silent Shadowmeld (Day)** - Your visit tonight behaves as if you never visited the target. - Infinite uses > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#144587]Sicco Thermaplugg[/color] > > > > **Gnome [color=#ABD473]Hunter[/color]** > **For the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Gnome [color=#ABD473]Hunter[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#ABD473]Hunter[/color] and all the passives of a Gnome. > **Swift Nimble Fingers (Day)** - Sabotage a player causing their day and night ability to be ineffective. - Infinite uses > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#144587]Prophet Velen[/color] > > > > **Draenei [color=#FFFFFF]Priest[/color]** > **For the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Draenei [color=#FFFFFF]Priest[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#FFFFFF]Priest[/color] and all the passives of a Draenei. > **Blessed Gift of the Naaru (Day)** - Target player cannot die by any means tonight. This is not considered healing or death immunity. - Infinite uses > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#144587]Genn Greymane[/color] > > > > **Worgen [color=#FFF569]Rogue[/color]** > **For the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Worgen [color=#FFF569]Rogue[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#FFF569]Rogue[/color] and all the passives of a Worgen. > **Precise Flay (Day)** - Maul a player. They will die in two nights unless healed. They will be aware. - Infinite uses > **[color=#144587]Alliance[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
[/details]
[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] [color=gold]Superpowers[/color]
[details="Superpower Races & Class"] > # [color=#8c1616]Thrall[/color] > > > > **Orc [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color]** > **For the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Orc [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color] and all the passives of an Orc. > **Precise Blood Fury (Day)** - Slash at a player. They will die in two nights unless healed. They will be aware. You will not commit suicide upon killing a member of your faction. - Infinite uses > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#8c1616]Sylvanas Windrunner[/color] > > > > **Undead [color=#ABD473]Hunter[/color]** > **For the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Undead [color=#ABD473]Hunter[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#ABD473]Hunter[/color] and all the passives of an Undead. > **Banshee's Touch of the Dead (Day)** - Establish a link between you and a dead player, allowing you to communicate for the day and night. - Infinite uses > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#8c1616]Baine Bloodhoof[/color] > > > > **Tauren [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color]** > **For the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Tauren [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#C79C6E]Warrior[/color] and all the passives of a Tauren. > **Thundering War Stomp (Day)** - Occupy the target player and all players targeting that player. You can visit them. - Infinite uses > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#8c1616]Vol'jin[/color] > > > > **Troll [color=#8787ED]Warlock[/color]** > **For the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Troll [color=#8787ED]Warlock[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#8787ED]Warlock[/color] and all the passives of a Troll. > **Regenerative Berserk (Day)** - Occupy all players targeting you tonight. If you successfully occupy someone with this ability you will heal yourself. - Infinite uses > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#8c1616]Kael'thas Sunstrider[/color] > > > > **Blood Elf [color=#40C7EB]Mage[/color]** > **For the [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **Experienced Blood Elf [color=#40C7EB]Mage[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=#40C7EB]Mage[/color] and all the passives of a Blood Elf. > **Infused Arcane Torrent (Day)** - Prevent any positive effects from affecting the target player tonight and anyone who visits them. - Infinite uses > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.*
> # [color=#8c1616]Gallywix[/color] > > > > **Goblin [color=black]?[/color]** > **For the [color=gold]Money[/color]! (Passive)** - All [color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] players within the game will know your identity and class. You may decide on a class to buy in the pre-game phase to adopt. You may use two different night abilities at the same time. > **EÌ¶xÌ¶pÌ¶eÌ¶rÌ¶iÌ¶eÌ¶nÌ¶cÌ¶eÌ¶d Goblin [color=black]?[/color] (Passive)** You have all abilities of a [color=black]?[/color] and all the passives of a Goblin. > **[color=gold]Luxury[/color] Rocket Jump (Day)** - Select a player. You and them will avoid all day abilities that would have affected either of you today. - Infinite uses > **[color=#8c1616]Horde[/color] Retribution (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses > *Ensure that all of the [color=#144587]Alliance[/color] are eliminated.* [/details]
